Tool

NameSuccessive Flow Routing
ID3
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013
Specificationgrid

Description

Calculation of flow accumulation, aka upslope contributing area, with the multiple flow direction method after Freeman (1991). References: Freeman, G.T. (1991): Calculating catchment area with divergent flow based on a rectangular grid. Computers & Geosciences, 17, pp.413-422. Pelletier, J.D. (2008): Quantitative Modeling of Earth Surface Processes. Cambridge, 295p.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
DEM Grid (input)DEM
Output
FlowGrid (output)FLOW
Options
IterationsIntegerITERATIONSMinimum: 1 Default: 100
RunoffFloating pointRUNOFFDefault: 1.000000
Manning's RoughnessFloating pointMANNINGDefault: 0.200000
